articles.content: At low speeds, inside the city, the Hyryder is quite peppy to drive. The electric torque really helps in closing gaps to the cars in front and makes the Hyryder an absolute breeze to drive in traffic… [+12694 chars]

articles.author: Gadgets Now Bureau
articles.title: Affordable TV market in India: How OnePlus, Samsung, Xiaomi and others have done in 2022 - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Counterpoint Research’s latest reports gives insight into how the smart TV market in India grew year-on-year in Q2 2022. The research briefs us about the performance of different television brands, including OnePlus, Samsung, Xiaomi, among others. Here’s what…
articles.content: The shipment of smart TVs in India witnessed an increase of 78 percent year-over-year in the second quarter of 2022. The top five brands in the Q2 2022 were Xiaomi, Samsung, OnePlus, LG and TCL. The … [+79 chars]
